title: Usage Details for user {member_name}

params.title: Kills
params.sql: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(kills_planes), 0) as "Planes", COALESCE(SUM(kills_helicopters), 0) "Helicopters", COALESCE(SUM(kills_ships), 0) as "Ships", COALESCE(SUM(kills_sams), 0) as "Air Defence", COALESCE(SUM(kills_ground), 0) as "Ground" FROM statistics s WHERE player_ucid = %(ucid)s and slot = %(module)s

footer:
Display is WIP, Guns for instance yet to come.
Values > 100% might be splash damage or incorrectly reported by DCS.
